DOC.brief_summary: This study determine appropriate dose frequency administration iv Mircera maintenance therapy hemodialysis patient chronic renal anemia previously receive iv epoetin . The anticipated time study treatment 3-12 month target sample size < 100 individual .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Intravenous ( iv ) Mircera Hemodialysis Patients With Chronic Renal Anemia
DOC.criteria: adult patient > =18 year age ; chronic renal anemia ; hemodialysis therapy least 3 month ; receive iv epoetin alfa 2 week prior runin period . woman pregnant , breastfeed use unreliable birth control method ; use investigational drug within 30 day runin phase , runin study treatment period .
